derivation: from H680 (אָצַל) (in the sense of joining);
outline:
1. beside, by, near, nearness, joining, proximity
  2. (BDB)
    1. conjunction, proximity
    2. beside, in proximity, contiguous to, from beside
kjv_def: at, (hard) by, (from) (beside), near (unto), toward, with. See also H1018 (בֵּית הָאֵצֶל).
